section.title: Overview
section.p: Hama is a distributed computing framework based on BSP (Bulk Synchronous Parallel) computing techniques for massive scientific computations, such as Google's Pregel, Currently being incubated as one of the incubator project by the Apache Software Foundation.

section.title: Getting Started
section.p: Start by installing Hama on a Hadoop cluster.

ul.li: Learn about Hama by reading the documentation.
Download Hama from the release page.
